articles.title: India wins cricket Twenty20 World Cup in exciting final against South Africa - CBS News
articles.description: India won its second T20 World Cup but its first world title in 12 years.
articles.content:
India pulled off a sensational seven-run win against South Africa in a gripping final of the Twenty20 World Cup on Saturday.
South Africa, playing its first ever final of an ICC tournament, needed a… [+1191 chars]

articles.title: Watch: Axar Patel's Huge Mistake Results In Run-Out. Rohit Sharma's Reaction Is Viral - NDTV Sports
articles.description: Axar Patel was dismissed for 47 off 31 balls in the T20 World Cup 2024 Final vs South Africa.
articles.content: Axar Patel missed out on a 2024 T20 World Cup Final half-century, as he was run out on 47. After a fine hand with the bat, Axar was caught off guard on the non-striker's end during the final against … [+1800 chars]
